title: Splash Screen on launch
custom_preconds:
GIVEN users are loading the app for the very first time on their iOS mobile device.

( https://jira.mlbam.com/browse/BP-6842 )

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user launches Ballpark for the first time after installation
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Ballpark branded splash screen will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user launches the app from a closed / killed state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Ballpark branded splash screen will be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user backgrounds then foregrounds the app while Ballpark is still cached in device memory
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Ballpark branded splash screen will NOT be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user has navigated to the Favorite Team picker (Either via on-boarding or Settings entry point)
AND NO teams have been selected
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see header text in bold that reads " Select Your Favorite Team"
AND the teams arranged in a 3x10 grid
AND the background of each cell will be white
AND in each cell will be a team logo
AND below each logo will be the Team city and team name
AND on the footer will be a blue "Next" button.

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user has navigated to the Favorite Team picker (via on-boarding or Settings entry point)
AND Taps on an unselected team.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the cell will be highlighted with the team's primary color
AND the team logo will be switched from the dark version to the light version
AND there will be a number displayed in the top right corner of the cell that indicates the favorite team's priority

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user has navigated to the Favorite Team picker (via on-boarding or Settings entry point)
AND Taps on a selected team.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the cell background will return to white
AND the team logo will be switched from the light version to the dark version
AND the teams priority number will be removed

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user has navigated to the Favorite Team picker (via on-boarding or Settings entry point)
AND selects multiple teams.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN any team that is tapped will toggle to the selected state
AND the priority indicator will reflect the order that the team cells are selected
